segments.text: I see the water just pouring out of the sink, and it’s making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right in it, and she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just tired or if she’s really that unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely missing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to be in for a big surprise when she finally looks down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger, and the floor is getting slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns off the faucet before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
